welcome.title: Welcome to Sahatak Telemedicine Platform
welcome.description: A secure and user-friendly platform to connect with doctors

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account
login.login_identifier_placeholder: Enter your email address or phone number

user_type_selection.title: Choose Your Account Type
user_type_selection.subtitle: Select the appropriate type for your account to provide you with the optimal experience
user_type_selection.patient_desc: I'm looking for medical consultation or follow-up on my health condition
user_type_selection.doctor_desc: I want to provide medical consultations to patients

medical_history_form.title: Medical History Form
medical_history_form.subtitle: Required for Appointment Booking
medical_history_form.info: Please fill out this form accurately to ensure you receive the best healthcare. All information is confidential and protected.

placeholders.history: Please mention any past or current medical conditions
placeholders.allergies: Do you have any allergies to medications or foods?
placeholders.medications: What medications are you currently taking?
placeholders.surgeries: Have you had any surgeries? When?
placeholders.family_history: Are there any hereditary diseases in your family?

doctor_profile.title: Complete Your Profile
doctor_profile.subtitle: Required for Account Verification

alerts.title: Profile Completion Required
alerts.message: Please complete all required information to submit your profile for verification.

labels.confirm: I confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete

placeholders.education: List your medical degrees, universities, and graduation years
placeholders.certifications: e.g., Board Certified in Internal Medicine
placeholders.address: Enter your clinic or hospital address

hints.languages: List all languages you can consult in

doctor_profile.document_info: Please upload clear copies of your documents. Accepted formats: PDF, JPG, PNG (Max 5MB)
doctor_profile.review_message: Please review your information before submitting for verification.

email_verification.title: Email Verification
email_verification.success_message: You can now login and use all platform features
email_verification.resend_sent: Verification link sent successfully. Please check your email
email_verification.verification_required: Please verify your email address before logging in
email_verification.check_email: Check your email for verification link

appointments.book_subtitle: Choose the right doctor and time for you
appointments.reason_placeholder: Write the reason for your visit...
appointments.terms_agree: I agree to terms of use and privacy policy
appointments.success_message: Your appointment has been booked successfully!
appointments.success_email: Appointment details will be sent to your email
appointments.doctor_participation_note: Volunteer doctors provide their services for free, while paid doctors charge consultation fees
appointments.no_doctors: No doctors available in this specialty
appointments.no_times: No available times on this day
appointments.cancel_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment?
appointments.cancellation_reason_placeholder: Write the reason for cancelling the appointment...
appointments.reschedule_reason_placeholder: Write the reason for rescheduling the appointment...
appointments.cannot_cancel_soon: Cannot cancel appointments less than 1 hour before

prompts.complete_before_appointment: Please complete your medical history before the appointment
prompts.review_after_3_months: Please review and update your medical history - it's been over 3 months since your last update
prompts.review_after_1_month: Please review your medical history for any changes since your last visit

timeline.title: Medical History Timeline

summary.title: Medical History Summary

form.allergies_placeholder: Write any allergies you have to medications or food...

patient_register.phone_placeholder: Enter your phone with country code e.g., +249123456789
patient_register.password_placeholder: Enter a strong password (at least 6 characters)
patient_register.password_help: Password must be at least 6 characters long

doctor_register.subtitle: Join Sahatak platform as a doctor
doctor_register.full_name_placeholder: Enter your complete name as on your ID

validation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.password_min: Password must be at least 6 characters long
validation.full_name_min: Full name must be at least 3 characters long
validation.full_name_required: Please enter your first and last name
validation.registration_success: Account created successfully! You can now login.

alerts.use_settings_to_edit: Please use the Settings section to edit your profile information.
alerts.confirm_reload_settings: Are you sure you want to reload settings from database?

alerts.two_factor_setup: Two-factor authentication setup will be implemented.

ai_triage.title: Quick Health Check
ai_triage.disclaimer: I am a digital health assistant and not a replacement for professional medical consultation.
ai_triage.welcome: Hello! Tell me what symptoms you are experiencing.

results.telemedicine: We can help you through Sahatak platform - book a remote consultation
results.in_person: In-person doctor visit recommended for physical examination
results.emergency: Please go to emergency room immediately or call an ambulance!

verification_notice.title: Account Verification Required
verification_notice.message: Your doctor account needs to be verified before you can access patient consultations and manage appointments. Please complete your profile and wait for admin approval.
verification_notice.verification_required_action: Your account must be verified first to access this feature. Please complete your profile and wait for admin approval.

user_settings.subtitle: Manage your preferences and account settings

doctor_participation.cannot_change: You cannot change participation type. Please contact administrator.

footer.description: A secure and trusted medical platform to connect with doctors remotely
footer.emergency_note: For non-urgent consultations use the platform
footer.medical_disclaimer: This platform does not replace visiting a doctor in emergency cases

services_page.title: Services - Sahatak
services_page.subtitle: Services
services_page.header_subtitle: A comprehensive list of healthcare and support services available through the Sahatak program.

report_problem.title: Report a Problem
report_problem.description: Tell us about any issues you face while using the app. Our support team will review and respond.
report_problem.subject: Subject
report_problem.description_placeholder: Describe the steps to reproduce the issue, expected vs actual behavior, and any error messages.
report_problem.attach_hint: Attach screenshots, logs, or a short recording (max 10MB).

about_page.title: About Sahatak
about_page.subtitle: Know Your Sahatak
about_page.brief_title: Welcome to Sahatak â€” Healthcare made simple
about_page.brief: Sahatak is designed for patients, caregivers, and families who want easy, reliable access to healthcare services. Whether you need a same-day appointment, a video consultation from home, help managing a chronic condition, or a quick answer about a medication â€” Sahatak brings tools and professionals together in one secure place.
about_page.overview_subtitle: Short descriptions to help you understand each service and when to use it

public_comment.title: Public Comment
public_comment.description: Share a quick public note â€” it will appear below with other feedback.

appointments.title: Online Appointment Booking
appointments.text: Find available slots with general practitioners and specialists, choose in-person or video visits, and get confirmations and reminders so you never miss an appointment.
appointments.hint: Use to schedule routine visits, follow-ups, or specialist consultations.

video.title: Video Consultations
video.text: Secure, private video visits with qualified healthcare providers. Join from your dashboard â€” ideal for minor illnesses, follow-ups, medication reviews, and care when travel is difficult.
video.hint: Use when physical exam isn't required or for quick clinical advice.

records.title: Access to Medical Records
records.text: Securely view and manage your health records, test results, and visit notes. Share records with your doctor during consultations so care decisions are based on the full picture.
records.hint: A single place for your health history, lab results, and imaging reports.

prescription.title: Prescription Management
prescription.text: Request prescription renewals, receive digital prescriptions directly in your account, and get guidance from doctors about medication use and side effects.
prescription.hint: Saves time on renewals and avoids unnecessary visits.

lab.title: Lab & Imaging Booking
lab.text: Book laboratory tests and radiology (Xâ€‘ray, MRI) appointments at partnered centers. Results are uploaded to your records and can be reviewed with your clinician.
lab.hint: Convenient scheduling and electronic delivery of results.

chronic.title: Chronic Disease Management
chronic.text: Tools and regular check-ins to help manage long-term conditions (diabetes, hypertension, asthma, etc.), including medication reminders, trend charts, and specialist care plans.
chronic.hint: Personalized follow-up and easier coordination with care teams.

family.title: Family Health Management
family.text: Manage health profiles for children, elderly relatives, or dependents from one account. Book appointments, view records, and receive reminders for multiple family members.
family.hint: Makes household health coordination simpler and safer.

personalized.title: Personalized Health Content
personalized.text: Curated articles, tips, and educational resources tailored to your age, conditions, and interests so you can make informed day-to-day choices about your health.
personalized.hint: AI recommends content relevant to your profile and goals.

chat.title: Secure Chat & 24/7 Support
chat.text: Use secure messaging to ask non-urgent clinical questions or get administrative help. For urgent triage, our 24/7 support provides guidance on next steps and directs you to appropriate care.
chat.hint: Not a replacement for emergency services â€” use ER for lifeâ€‘threatening issues.

nutrition.title: Nutrition & Diet Counseling
nutrition.text: Personalized meal plans and dietary advice to help you meet health goals.
nutrition.hint: Nutrition guidance tailored to conditions and goals.

maternal_child_health.title: Maternal & Child Health
maternal_child_health.text: Antenatal care, pediatric services and postnatal follow-up.
maternal_child_health.hint: Care and follow-up for mothers and children.

specialist_referrals.title: Specialist Referrals
specialist_referrals.text: Coordinated referrals to specialist clinics and hospitals.
specialist_referrals.hint: When you need care from a specialist.

ai.title: AI Healthcare Assistant
ai.text: Your smart AI companion helps answer medical questions, suggest health tips, and guide you through managing conditions with contextual suggestions.
ai.hint: Use for quick guidance, health tips, and non-urgent medical questions.

delivery.title: Medication Delivery
delivery.text: Get prescribed medicines delivered to your home. Track orders, view delivery status, and contact support if there are issues.
delivery.hint: Convenient for those with mobility challenges or busy schedules.

insurance.title: Insurance & Administrative Help
insurance.text: Assistance with insurance questions, claims guidance, and help submitting necessary documents to speed approvals for visits and tests.
insurance.hint: Support to reduce billing surprises and paperwork.
